definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: I request for statement by post. HK$20/month will be charged.
sentences.chinese: 本人要求郵寄月結單，每月手續費爲$20。

sentences.english: We cannot accept copies of online credit card statements.
sentences.chinese: 我們不接受在線信用卡賬戶電子結單的複印件。

sentences.english: My bank statement shows a balance of 150 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 我的銀行結單顯示結存150英鎊。

sentences.english: The associate should verify that charge errors are corrected in subsequent monthly statements.
sentences.chinese: 主管人員應確認的錯誤糾正在隨後的月結單。

sentences.english: Transfer from bank statement balance to cashbook balance.
sentences.chinese: 從銀行結單餘額調到現金簿的餘額。

sentences.english: Exclude monthly statement during the fee waiver period.
sentences.chinese: 豁免期內不包括郵寄月結單。

sentences.english: I/We may incur additional costs for using the E-Statement Service.
sentences.chinese: 本公司或招致額外費用方可使用取覽電子結單服務。

sentences.english: Language selected will be effective in the following month.
sentences.chinese: 所選擇之結單語言將於下一個月生效。

sentences.english: Cancellation of Consolidated Statement Service is not allowed for Investment Services Account.
sentences.chinese: 取消綜合月結單服務不適用於投資服務戶口。

definition: to replace a purchase/to exchange a purchase
fig. people who cannot afford to buy their own house
toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
delaying tactics/stalling/measures to stave off an attack/stratagem to win a respite
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
